bioghist.p: Swedenborgian church that once stood in Frankford

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of records of the New Jerusalem Society. Materials include: a cemetery lot map; deeds, mortgages, and legal records related to property (court records relating to the sale of church building and burial grounds also provide historical information on the development of the church); lists of church members, and lists of contributors with addresses; a small number of photographs of the church and pastors; pastor's notes; meeting minutes of the society, 1846-1852, 1874-1893; church committee reports; constitution of the society; constitution, bylaws and meeting minutes of the Sunday School Association; birth records and lists of marriages (1890-1917) and baptisms (1824-1917) performed; and estate records for Isabella L. Simons.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
